text:

html: Fact check: President Trump says a wall would keep illegal drugs out of the US. But the majority of illegal drugs entering the US from Mexico come in through ports of entry — official border crossings. A wall would have no impact. #TrumpAddresshttps://bit.ly/2H2UdbE
text:
Fact check: President Trump says a wall would keep illegal drugs out of the US. 

But the majority of illegal drugs entering the US from Mexico come in through ports of entry — official border crossings. A wall would have no impact. #TrumpAddresshttps://bit.ly/2H2UdbE
